description.physical_description: A twisted, ancient spire rises from the heart of a dense, mist-shrouded forest. The once-sleek white stone is now covered in a thick layer of ivy and moss, with vines that seem to writhe like living serpents. A perpetual chill hangs in the air, as if the very fabric of reality has been torn apart by some unseen force.
description.historical_background: This was once a hub for cutting-edge research into the human psyche, where scientists delved deep into the mysteries of memory and the mind. However, their experiments went catastrophically wrong, unleashing an otherworldly energy that consumed everything in its path. Now, the Spire stands as a macabre monument to the horrors that lurk within the recesses of the human mind.

sensory_observations: The air is heavy with the scent of decay and forgotten memories.
Faint whispers seem to echo through the halls, tempting adventurers deeper into the Spire's labyrinthine passages.
Shadows dance upon the walls, as if malevolent spirits are watching every move.

levels.name: The Entrance Level
levels.description: A grand foyer, once adorned with intricate frescoes and polished marble. Now, it's a dimly lit chamber filled with the remnants of abandoned lives.

traps.name: The Mirror's Gaze
traps.description: A broken mirror seems to stare back at adventurers, reflecting their deepest fears and desires.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the mirror

traps.name: The Flickering Candle
traps.description: A flickering candle seems to be blown out by an unseen force, plunging the area into darkness.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the candles
effect: Light source must be used to dispel

levels.name: The Laboratory Level
levels.description: A maze of cramped workstations and abandoned equipment, where scientists once toiled away. The air is thick with the stench of chemicals and forgotten experiments.
features: Cryptic notes scrawled on the walls

traps.name: The Toxic Fumes
traps.description: A hidden leak of noxious fumes is triggered by adventurers' presence.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the workstations

traps.name: The Shattered Glass
traps.description: A hidden glass vial is shattered, releasing a deadly serum that spreads across the floor.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the broken glassware

levels.name: The Memory Level
levels.description: A realm of shifting terrors, where memories long buried come flooding back. Doors lead to labyrinthine corridors, each filled with visions and nightmares.
features: Doors that seem to shift and change

traps.name: The Hall of Whispers
traps.description: A maze of corridors seems to shift and change, making it difficult for adventurers to navigate.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the doors

traps.name: The Memory Overload
traps.description: A burst of memories from a nearby room is triggered, overwhelming adventurers' minds.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the visions
effect: Overwhelmed adventurers suffer disadvantage on next action

levels.name: The Heart of the Spire
levels.description: A central chamber where the source of the Cursed Echoes resides. A glowing crystal, imbued with the collective memories of humanity.
features: Echoes of a thousand forgotten lives

traps.name: The Crystal's Call
traps.description: The glowing crystal seems to call out to adventurers, tempting them closer.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the crystal

traps.name: The Unstable Energies
traps.description: Unstable energies are triggered, causing the room to shake and tremble.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the crystal
effect: Dexterity check to avoid falling objects

entities.name: The Mirror's Guardian
entities.description: A mysterious figure stands guard over the broken mirror.

traps.name: The Guardian's Wrath
traps.description: The guardian is triggered, attacking adventurers with a nearby glass shard.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the mirror
effect: Guardian has advantage on next turn

entities.name: The Scientist's Assistant
entities.description: A nervous assistant frantically searches for a cure in the laboratory.

traps.name: The Assistant's Panic
traps.description: The assistant is triggered, panicking and causing nearby equipment to malfunction.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the workstations

entities.name: The Memorykeeper
entities.description: A mystical figure tends to the memories in the Heart of the Spire.

traps.name: The Memorykeeper's Curse
traps.description: The memorykeeper is triggered, placing a curse on adventurers that causes them to relive traumatic memories.
traps.activation: Triggered by adventurers approaching the crystal
effect: Adventurers suffer disadvantage on next action
